actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration, H. Rept. 94-843.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: Resolution to provide funds for the expenses of the investigations and studies to be conducted by the Committee on Agriculture.

summary.text: Authorizes the expenditure of $797,561.35 by the House Committee on Agriculture for investigations and studies conducted during the second session of the 94th Congress. Allocates $166,361.35 of such funds to procure the services of consultants. Prohibits the use of any part of the funds authorized by this resolution for expenditure in connection with the study or investigation of any subject which is being investigated for the same purpose by any other committee of the House.

titles.title: Resolution to provide funds for the expenses of the investigations and studies to be conducted by the Committee on Agriculture.
